result.name: benefits-and-credits-error-and-fraud-analytical-programme-efap_1
result.notes: Contains the results of enquiries carried out by claimant compliance into a stratified random sample of 5,000 finalised Child and Working tax credit awards. Details include yield found, direction of the yield, risk category, as well as designatory data. Updated: annually. Data coverage: 2003/04, 2004/05, 2005/06, 2006/07, 2007/08, 2008/09, 2009/10, 2010/11, 2011/12

organization.name: hm-revenue-and-customs
organization.title: HM Revenue and Customs
organization.description:
What we do

We are the UK’s tax authority. We are responsible for making sure that the money is available to fund the UK’s public services and for helping families and individuals with targeted financial support.

HMRC is a non-ministerial department, supported by 2 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/hm-revenue-customs

result.title: Benefits and Credits Error and Fraud Analytical Programme (EFAP)
